messages.TRMSG_PRE_BATTLE:
I’ve lost my way...
Here of all places...
messages.TRMSG_DEFEAT:
Having lost his way, the Trainer lost
the battle too...
messages.TRMSG_POST_BATTLE:
From being lost in the mountains so
long, I became a Hiker...
messages.TRMSG_REMATCH:
I’ve lost my way again...Yes, it’s me again with no sense of
direction...
